definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Conference call Q&As are a confusing and cryptic dance.
sentences.chinese: 公司的电话会议上的问答阶段像个混乱和神秘的舞蹈。

sentences.english: Phone conferences and leisurely gabfests should be done on a landline.
sentences.chinese: 电话会议和长时间的闲聊应该用座机。

sentences.english: Managing conflicts is harder in teleconferences.
sentences.chinese: 电话会议中的冲突更难管理。

sentences.english: Expertise can be share worldwide through teleconferencing.
sentences.chinese: 通过电话会议可以分享专业知识。

sentences.english: Her husband is on a conference call with the office -- again.
sentences.chinese: 而且她丈夫又在开电话会议了。

sentences.english: I have a conference call on 9:00am.
sentences.chinese: 按照日程，我在九点有一个电话会议。

sentences.english: Ms. Jung declined to comment, but acknowledged the frustration on Thursday's conference call.
sentences.chinese: 钟彬娴拒绝置评，但承认周四的电话会议令人沮丧。

sentences.english: It is a low-cost version of a phone or conference calling.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个低成本版的手机或电话会议。

sentences.english: One of the more useful areas in which to implement this project is in a teleconference annotation application.
sentences.chinese: 此项目的应用领域之一是电话会议注释应用程序。

sentences.english: Start an join an Unscheduled Conference Call.
sentences.chinese: 开始并加入计划外电话会议。

sentences.english: They speak of electronic town meetings and virtual communities.
sentences.chinese: 他们在虚拟的电话会议上发言说话。

sentences.english: On conference calls we spoke in amateurish code.
sentences.chinese: 而我们在电话会议时，则用一些简单的密码。

sentences.english: In these two episodes, we'll learn vocabulary associated with teleconferences.
sentences.chinese: 在这两集中，我们将学习和电话会议有关的词汇。

sentences.english: Why don't we use Netmeeting instead of teleconference? It's free.
sentences.chinese: 为什么不用网络会议代替电话会议呢？还是免费的。

pinyin: nian2 du4 gu3 dong1 da4 hui4

definition: executive/senior management/(contraction of 高級管理|高级管理)
